title: Buying RP
body:
The store skips step 2 and dosent ask for any of my billing info, and declined my card (trust me the info wasnt wrong, it didnt even try to run it)
Whats going on?

replies.body:
Are you using a saved payment method? Since the current game client is essentially a frame for Internet Explorer, you may find the solution to be clearing the browser data for IE using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).

Let me know if this helped.
